title: Naya Rivera shows off post-baby body in purple gown at Golden Globes 2016 party
title_page: Naya Rivera shows off post-baby body in purple gown at Golden Globes 2016 party | Daily Mail Online
text:
Naya Rivera had her post-baby body on full display on Sunday in a purple satin Pamella Roland gown at the Golden Globe Awards after-party.
The former Glee star dared to bare in the gorgeous gown with a plunging neckline for the party at The Beverly Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills, California.
The sultry dress included a revealing thigh slit and hugged Naya's figure.
Scroll down for video
New mother: Naya Rivera showcased her post-baby body in a purple Pamella Roland gown with plunging neckline on Sunday at the Golden Globe Awards after-party in Beverly Hils, California
Naya showed off an even tan in the ensemble that included open-toed black heels.
She wore her dark brown hair loose around her shoulders and accentuated her dark eyes with smoky makeup.
Naya, who turns 29 on Tuesday, earlier this month tweeted that she was close to her 'goal weight'.
Goal weight: The Glee star earlier this month tweeted that she was close to her goal weight
Smoking style: She wore her dark brown hair loose around her shoulders and accentuated her dark eyes with smoky makeup
'2016 is off to a great start already! 4lbs away from my goal weight!' she tweeted on January 4 to her nearly two million followers on Twitter.
Naya has been working hard on getting in shape since she and husband Ryan Dorsey welcomed their son Josey Hollis on September 17.
She told a fan on Twitter before Thanksgiving that she was eager to 'get back in shape'.
Post-baby body: Naya looked utterly confident as she sashayed down the red carpet in her flesh-flashing dress
Husband and wife: The actress was escorted to the party by her husband Ryan Dorsey
Classic picture: Naya shared an Instagram photo on Christmas Eve of her infant son Josey with Santa Claus
Naya since then regularly has been tweeting about attending spinning classes.
The actress and singer wrote about the challenges of breastfeeding in a blog post last month on People.com.
'Bottom line, it’s hard! Breastfeeding is like finding out that all of a sudden you can get bacon from your elbow... It's a trip,' she wrote.
New parents: Ryan and Naya are shown last month in Los Angeles
Naya discussed how she became obsessed over learning the proper techniques as well as her problems with chaffing and engorgement.
She also candidly wrote about emotional toll of breastfeeding.
'I started to feel like I was only a tit to Josey, and there was many a time I would walk in the door to a crying baby and immediately have to strip and feed,' she shared.
Cute baby: Josey showed off his cute smile in an Instagram post that Naya posted last month
Naya also wrote about how breastfeeding allowed her to connect with her baby on a deeper level than anyone else.
'There’s also something amazing about the fact that you are sustaining a human life solely with your body. The benefits of breast milk for babies far outweigh the negative side effects for mom,' she wrote.
Naya shocked fans when she got married to Ryan, a longtime friend, soon after she and Big Sean bitterly called off their engagement.
